title: ADC LFT - Competitive / Tryhard Only -  No Casual

embed.description: twtvmonklol1 / Platinum 2 23LP / 153W 134L Win Ratio 53% / Lucian - 29W 21L Win Ratio 58%, Ezreal - 25W 14L Win Ratio 64%, Lee Sin - 21W 16L Win Ratio 57%, Corki - 10W 13L Win Ratio 43%, Vi - 12W 9L Win Ratio 57%

body:
- able to speak GER/EN fluent
- 20 y o
- Ad Main
- only lf competitive & tryhard
- open champpool -> Metaoriented e.g. Cait, Sivir, Vayne, Kaisa, Lucian, Ezreal etc.
- Teamranked experienced ( until D4)
- streaming actively 
- ESL Play Account
- tiltproof
- able to take and give criticism
- able to play 3-6x Training per Week + SoloQ
- SoloQ Goal -> Master Tier I

If you are interested, then add me so we can get in touch and talk about the details.

Dears, "twtvmonklol1"
